code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UserForm(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const fetchUsers=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/api/users/');setUsers(res.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching users:',error);}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await api.post('/users/',{name,email});setName('');setEmail('');fetchUsers();}catch(error){console.error('Error creating user:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create New User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",type:"email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add User"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Users List:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[user.name," (",user.email,")"]},user.id))})]});}
